name: Falling Shamrocks
description:
Can you catch the Falling Shamrocks before they hit the ground?

"Falling Shamrocks is fun, exciting and challenging! Fun of the whole family!"

Move your basket from side to side catching the Shamrocks as they fall from the top of the screen. Catch the number of Shamrocks needed to complete each level. Each level gets more challenging. If you drop too many Shamrocks the game is over!

Complete all 5 levels and you Win the Game! Be careful, it is not as easy as it sounds!

There are 4 Skill levels and 5 exciting game levels to play.

There are two styles of game play.

"Regular" & "One Shot"

Regular - allows you to drop 3 Shamrocks in any level before game is over.

One Shot - if you drop 1 Shamrock in any level, the game is over.

Are you up to the Falling Shamrocks challenge? The only way to find out is to play!

Happy St. Patrick's Day!


* If you like this app, please write a review and also share this app with your friends on Facebook and Twitter. Thank you.

** If you are experiencing technical problems with this app, or if you have ideas on how to make this app better, please contact us by pressing the "App Support" button located in the Information screen.

Thank you.
